DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness of EXPAREL in a transversus abdominis plane block by assessing the demand of postoperative narcotic, length of hospital stay and incidence of postoperative complications.
DOC.brief_title: The Transversus Abdominis Plane Block: A Prospective Randomized Clinical Trial Using EXPAREL.
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients over the age of 18 years w 2. Elective laparoscopic colorectal resection. 1. Patients under 18 years. 2. Patients unable to provide informed consent 3. Patients undergoing emergency surgery. 4. Pregnant women 5. Severe liver or kidney disease (GFR 1529 ml/min)
